name: TaskTrackr
describe: A detailed and organized project management app that tracks projects, tasks, status, and dates. Use it either for large-scale projects, or even simple to-do lists.

name: Developing Feelings
describe: A dating app developed by software engineers, for software engineers. Create an account and connect with people like you.

name: WeatherWise
describe: An easy-to-use and visually appealing app to help anyone find current weather data in their city.
